abstract.t: This document updates NMDA [RFC8342] to define a read-only conventional configuration datastore called "system" to hold system- defined configurations. To avoid clients' explicit copy/paste of referenced system-defined configuration, a "resolve-system" parameter has been defined to allow the server acting as a "system client" to populate referenced system-defined nodes automatically. The solution enables clients to reference nodes defined in <system>, overwrite values of configurations defined in <system>, and configure descendant nodes of system-defined nodes.
